query: SELECT b.id, b.title, b.author, b.wordCount, LENGTH(b.extractedText) as textLength, i.id as insightId, i.status, i.title as insightTitle FROM books b LEFT JOIN insights i ON b.id = i.bookId ORDER BY b.id DESC LIMIT 5;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2PprtSQ4Zk9Y5ny.6019c350dade --database 933kVN2MUY2BXrPTFo6Jq7 --execute SELECT b.id, b.title, b.author, b.wordCount, LENGTH(b.extractedText) as textLength, i.id as insightId, i.status, i.title as insightTitle FROM books b LEFT JOIN insights i ON b.id = i.bookId ORDER BY b.id DESC LIMIT 5;
